Open source OpenInviterTM (Open InviterTM) is a free import contacts (addressbook) script from email providers like Lycos, Hushmail, GMail, Virgilio, Plaxo, Live/Hotmail, Apropo, Gawab, Inbox.com, Meta, Inet, Mynet.com, LinkedIn, Sapo.pt, Web.de, Mail.ru, Grafitti, Canoe, Mail.in, Nz11, Xing, Bordermail, Freemail, Popstarmail, KataMail, 5Fm, Doramail, Mail2World, Uk2, Care2, Aussiemail, Techemail, Walla, FastMail, Rediff, Rambler, Wp.pt, Libero, Netaddress, Zapakmail, OperaMail, Terra, Evite, O2, GMX.net, Clevergo, YouTube, AOL, Yandex, IndiaTimes, India, Interia, Bigstring, Mail.com, Pochta, Atlas, Yahoo!, Kids, Abv, MSN, Azet or social portals like Last.fm, Bookcrossing, Lovento, Orkut, Flickr, Eons, Ning, Livejournal, Tagged, Plurk, Facebook, Friendster, Kincafe, Skyrock, Konnects, Fdcareer, Cyworld, Meinvz, Xuqa, Vkontakte, Motortopia, Hi5, Mevio, Xanga, Hyves, Multiply, Perfspot, Flingr, Bebo, Twitter, Koolro, Friendfeed, NetLog, Badoo, Famiva, Plazes, Mydogspace, Mycatspace, Flixster, Vimeo, Brazencareerist, Faces, MySpace. This contacts importer script is integrating with content management systems (aka CMS) like Vwebmail, symfony, Atmail5, vBulletin, PHPMELODY, SimpleMachines Forum (SMF), PhpBB, Buddy Zone, Boonex Dolphin, jamit job, E107, Etano, RoundCube, Dating Pro, myBB, Social Engine 4, Wordpress, Joomla1.0, Drupal, Social Engine, Joomla, JamRoom, nowFire, phpizabi, joovili, PunBB, phpFoX. Open Inviter is written in PHP 5 (no database required but cURL or wget required) and running on any webserver (tested on Apache) offering advanced tell a friend features. OpenInviterTM is a free self hosted solution that does not use a third party gateway (or API) to import contacts.Download it at: OpenInviter
